# rn

Germanic r⇔n shift rn

𓐍 𓏏 𓊮 | fire | kindle (germanic n⇔r)

make breath = marr frymë ⇔ πνεῦμα pneuma

SHE 𒊺𒂊 šeʳ 𒊺𒂊 shair šɛar "hair" @ Elamite / Berber
SHE 𒊺𒂊 šeᵒⁿ 𓍲 𓈖 𓏮 𓁸 𓏥 "hair" @ Elamite ⇔ 𒆪𒈾 RN

𒅆𒋆𒋾 𒀾𒊿
ši-rik-ti áš-ruk
Šenkt á'šenk (šarāku ⇔ schenk via RN )
give a gift

𒍢𒁕𒉡 ṣi-da-nu Schwindeln vertigo paladin? 𒍢𒁕𒉡 ṣi-da-nu سَدَارَة sadāra RN
